actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to extend the matching fund waiver for projects approved under title 23, United States Code.

summary.text: Amends the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to extend the matching fund waiver (allowing States to request the Federal share of construction costs up to 100 percent) for Federal-aid highway projects.

titles.title: To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to extend the matching fund waiver for projects approved under title 23, United States Code.
